SELECT '107'||TO_CHAR(SYSDATE, 'yymmddhh24miss')||SEQ_CYCLE_FOR_ID.nextval FROM DUAL

mapper.update:
update T_LIQUIDATION_ORDER
MERCHANT_ID = #{merchantId,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
MERCHANT_NAME = #{merchantName,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
PRODUCT_CODE = #{productCode,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
TRANS_TYPE = #{transType,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
TRANS_STATUS = #{transStatus,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
TRANS_CURRENCY = #{transCurrency,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
TRANS_AMOUNT = #{transAmount,jdbcType=DECIMAL},
SETTLE_CURRENCY = #{settleCurrency,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
SETTLE_DATE = #{settleDate,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
SUB_ACCOUNT_DATA = #{subAccountData,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
STATUS = #{status,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
FEE_TYPE = #{feeType,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
FEE_ID = #{feeId,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
FEE_FLAG = #{feeFlag,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
MERCHANT_ORDER_ID = #{merchantOrderId,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
ORDER_ID = #{orderId,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
PAY_ORDER_ID = #{payOrderId,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
ORI_MERCHANT_ORDER_ID = #{oriMerchantOrderId,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
ORI_ORDER_ID = #{oriOrderId,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
ORI_PAY_ORDER_ID = #{oriPayOrderId,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
PAY_COMPLETE_TIME = #{payCompleteTime,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP},
PAY_METHOD = #{payMethod,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
TRANS_METHOD = #{transMethod,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
PAY_ORG_CODE = #{payOrgCode,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
PAY_KIND = #{payKind,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
CARD_COUNTRY = #{cardCountry,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
CARD_TYPE = #{cardType,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
TRANS_MODEL = #{transModel,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
CARD_NO = #{cardNo,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
REGION = #{region,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
IS_ALL_REFUND =#{isAllRefund,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
CALC_FEE_ID=#{calcFeeId,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
GMT_UPDATE_TIME = systimestamp
where ID = #{id,jdbcType=VARCHAR}

update T_LIQUIDATION_ORDER set MERCHANT_ID = #{merchantId,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, MERCHANT_NAME = #{merchantName,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, PRODUCT_CODE = #{productCode,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, TRANS_TYPE = #{transType,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, TRANS_STATUS = #{transStatus,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, TRANS_CURRENCY = #{transCurrency,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, TRANS_AMOUNT = #{transAmount,jdbcType=DECIMAL}, SETTLE_CURRENCY = #{settleCurrency,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, SETTLE_DATE = #{settleDate,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, SUB_ACCOUNT_DATA = #{subAccountData,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, STATUS = #{status,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, FEE_TYPE = #{feeType,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, FEE_ID = #{feeId,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, FEE_FLAG = #{feeFlag,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, MERCHANT_ORDER_ID = #{merchantOrderId,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, ORDER_ID = #{orderId,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, PAY_ORDER_ID = #{payOrderId,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, ORI_MERCHANT_ORDER_ID = #{oriMerchantOrderId,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, ORI_ORDER_ID = #{oriOrderId,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, ORI_PAY_ORDER_ID = #{oriPayOrderId,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, PAY_COMPLETE_TIME = #{payCompleteTime,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP}, GMT_UPDATE_TIME = systimestamp, PAY_METHOD = #{payMethod,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, TRANS_METHOD = #{transMethod,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, PAY_ORG_CODE = #{payOrgCode,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, PAY_KIND = #{payKind,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, CARD_COUNTRY = #{cardCountry,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, CARD_TYPE = #{cardType,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, TRANS_MODEL = #{transModel,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, CARD_NO = #{cardNo,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, REGION = #{region,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, IS_ALL_REFUND =#{isAllRefund,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, CALC_FEE_ID=#{calcFeeId,jdbcType=VARCHAR} where ID = #{id,jdbcType=VARCHAR}
mapper.select:
select
from t_liquidation_order where 1=1
and MERCHANT_ID = #{merchantId}
AND GMT_CREATE_TIME >= (to_date(#{orderDate}, 'yyyy-MM-dd')-1)
AND GMT_CREATE_TIME < to_date(#{orderDate}, 'yyyy-MM-dd')
group by MERCHANT_ID, MERCHANT_NAME, ORDER_ID, ORI_ORDER_ID, TRANS_TYPE, TRANS_CURRENCY, TRANS_AMOUNT, ORI_MERCHANT_ORDER_ID, MERCHANT_ORDER_ID, GMT_CREATE_TIME order by GMT_CREATE_TIME asc

select
from t_liquidation_order where 1=1 and MERCHANT_ID = #{merchantId} AND GMT_CREATE_TIME >= (to_date(#{tradeDate}, 'yyyy-MM-dd')-1) AND GMT_CREATE_TIME < to_date(#{tradeDate}, 'yyyy-MM-dd') order by GMT_CREATE_TIME asc
select distinct t.merchant_id from t_liquidation_order t where 1 = 1 order by t.merchant_id desc
select from CSS.T_LIQUIDATION_ORDER t where t.status = '02' order by t.merchant_id desc
